settings.content: TERRA Nappies are lovingly crafted to give your baby the gentle beginning they deserve. TERRA Nappies are soft, breathable, and ultra-absorbent, keeping your newborn dry and comfortable through every little moment. Made with safe, plant-based materials and dermatologically tested for sensitive skin, they're as gentle as your touch.
üéüÔ∏è Use code "Beauty" for 10% OFF!

settings.heading: Ingredients¬†
settings.content:
• Absorbent core made with premium Japanese materials for superior dryness.
  • 100% FSC-certified natural wood pulp from the USA.
  • Soft tissue layers for extra comfort and absorption.
  • Breathable backsheet made from biodegradable bamboo fibre.
  • Gentle leg cuffs made from biodegradable bamboo fibre (not bamboo viscose).
  • Leak-proof layer made from eco-friendly corn starch.
  • Soft topsheet made from food-grade material.
  • Wetness indicator made from 100% plant-based materials.
  • Printed with non-toxic, food-grade inks.
  • Recyclable kraft paper packaging with rice-based materials.

settings.heading: Key Features of TERRA Nappy
settings.content:
• Breathable Bamboo Back Sheet - Made from 100% biodegradable bamboo fibre for all-day comfort and airflow.
  • Smart Wetness Indicator - Clearly shows when it's time for a change, ensuring freshness and convenience.
  • 12+ Hours of Dryness - Advanced absorption keeps your baby dry, comfortable, and rash-free through day and night.
  • Dermatologically rated 'Excellent' - Safe, gentle, and suitable for even the most sensitive skin.
  • Super Absorbent Core - Crafted with 100% USA natural wood pulp and Japanese SAP for superior leak protection.
  • 3D Leak Guard Technology - Secure fit and crevice leg design actively prevent leaks and side spills.
  • Ultra-Soft 360¬∞ Stretch Waistband - Provides a snug, flexible fit that moves effortlessly with your baby for all-day comfort and easy pull-up wear.

settings.heading: Delivery  and  return policy
settings.content:
Our team will¬†ship your order within 5 business days. The time it takes to receive your order depends on the shipping method chosen at checkout.¬†

We hope you to love it, but if you need to make a return, breathe easy. Returns are always free and can be done in person or by mail.¬†

settings.heading: Find the Perfect Fit

settings.text: From newborn snuggles to toddler tumbles, our easy size chart helps you choose the right Terra Nappy for every stage. Gentle, comfy, and planet-friendly, because every baby deserves the perfect fit.

settings.heading: Video scene
A New Generation of Plant-Based Nappies
CIRCULAR BY DESIGN

settings.text:
We design for the end from the very start.
Every part of our packaging is¬†paper-based, recyclable or compostable, and plastic-free down to the cloth core. Even¬†off-cuts are re-purposed, turned into¬†fish bait, cleaning pads, or donated to local kindergartens¬†for crafts.

settings.heading: A New Generation of Plant-Based Nappies
MADE THE NATURAL WAY

settings.text:
We took a different path, building our own dedicated manufacturing network and long-term local partners, so we know exactly¬†where and how every part is made.

We choose¬†only naturally processed materials¬†and¬†source ingredients locally wherever possible, reducing transport miles while ensuring¬†complete traceability, safety, and freshness.

This level of control is how we make sure¬†every product truly reflects our values, from the very first fibre to the final pack.

settings.heading: Follow @terra.co.nz
Frequently Asked Questions

settings.text: Explore answers to the most common questions about Terra Nappies, crafted to give you clarity and confidence.

settings.heading: What makes Terra nappy pants different from regular nappies?
settings.content: Terra nappy pants are crafted from up to 85% plant-based materials, including biodegradable bamboo fibre and FSC-certified wood pulp. Free from harsh chemicals, plastics, and synthetic fragrances, they offer a safer and more sustainable alternative to traditional nappies, now in an easy pull-up design for growing toddlers.

settings.heading: Are Terra Walker Nappy Pants safe for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Walker nappy pants are dermatologically tested and rated "excellent," making them suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. They contain 0% Chlorine chlorine, latex, parabens, fragrances, or other common irritants.

settings.heading: Are Terra Walker Nappy Pants biodegradable?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Walker nappy pants are made with 100% biodegradable bamboo fibre and a plant-based absorbent core. While not fully compostable due to hygiene regulations, they decompose significantly faster than conventional nappy products.

settings.heading: How long can my child wear a Walker Nappy Pant?
settings.content: Terra Walker Nappy Pants are designed for up to 12 hours of dryness. The advanced plant-based absorbent core offers long-lasting protection ideal for both busy days and overnight use.

settings.heading: Do Terra Nappy Pants have a wetness indicator?
settings.content: Yes, Terra nappy pants feature a plant-based wetness indicator that changes colour with moisture build-up, so it's easy to know when it's time for a change.

settings.heading: What sizes do Terra nappy pants come in?
settings.content: Terra offers nappy pants in a range of sizes designed to support your child's development from toddler through to junior stages.

settings.heading: How do I choose the right size nappy pants for my child?
settings.content: Check your child's weight and refer to the size chart on the packaging or website. If you notice leaks or red marks, it might be time to size up for a better fit.

settings.heading: How often should I change my baby's nappy pants?
settings.content: At the walker stage, toddlers usually need 5-6 changes per day. Frequent changes help maintain hygiene, prevent leaks, and keep the skin fresh, especially during active play.

settings.heading: Why are Walker Nappy Pants ideal for toddlers?
settings.content: Walker Nappy Pants offer a flexible, pull-up design that supports your child's independence while keeping them comfortable. Made with breathable bamboo fibre and a soft, stretchable waistband, they provide excellent fit and skin protection for on-the-go toddlers.

settings.heading: What size should I choose for my toddler?
settings.content: If your child weighs between 13-18 kg (28-39 lbs), the Walker nappy pant size is the ideal fit. For the best results, use the sizing guide available on our website.

settings.heading: Are Walker Nappy Pants suitable for overnight use?
settings.content: Yes, with up to 12 hours of absorbency, Terra Walker Nappy Pants are built to handle nighttime wetting and keep your child dry and comfortable during sleep.

settings.heading: Do Terra Walker nappy pants help reduce the risk of nappy rash?
settings.content: Absolutely, the breathable design and chemical-free materials help minimise moisture build-up and irritation, which are common triggers of nappy rash.

settings.heading: How do Terra Walker nappy pants support comfort and movement?
settings.content: Terra Walker Nappy Pants are designed with a flexible waistband, soft side panels, and 3D leak guards that move with your child. They offer a secure yet gentle fit that doesn't restrict motion, allowing active toddlers to walk, climb, and play freely while staying protected.

settings.heading: Are Terra walker nappy pants easy to change on an active toddler?
settings.content: Yes, Terra walker nappy pants feature an easy pull-up design that makes changes quick and mess-free. Tear-away side seams allow for fast and hassle-free removal, even with wriggly or active toddlers.

settings.heading: Can Terra walker nappy pants handle frequent wetting at this stage?
settings.content: Yes, the sustainable, high-capacity absorbent core is engineered to lock in moisture and manage increased output common at the toddler stage.

settings.heading: Is the packaging eco-friendly, too?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Walker Nappy Pants are packed in recyclable craft paper and rice-based materials, reflecting our ongoing commitment to plastic-free, sustainable solutions.

settings.heading: What makes Terra nappies different from regular nappies?
settings.content: Terra nappies are crafted from up to 85% plant-based materials, including bamboo fibre and FSC-certified wood pulp. They're free of harsh chemicals, plastics, and synthetic fragrances, offering a safer, more sustainable alternative to conventional nappies.

settings.heading: Are Terra nappies safe for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Yes, Terra nappies are dermatologically tested and rated "excellent," making them suitable for all skin types. They contain no chlorine, latex, parabens, fragrances, or other common irritants.

settings.heading: Are Terra nappies biodegradable?
settings.content: Terra nappies contain biodegradable components, such as bamboo fibre, and a plant-based absorbent core. While they are not fully compostable due to hygiene regulations, they break down faster than traditional nappies, helping reduce long-term environmental impact.

settings.heading: How long can my baby wear a Terra nappy?
settings.content: Terra Nappies are designed to keep your baby dry for up to 12 hours. The high-performance, plant-based absorbent core provides reliable protection during the day and overnight comfort.

settings.heading: Do Terra nappies have a wetness indicator?
settings.content: Yes, Terra nappies feature a plant-based wetness indicator that changes colour as moisture increases, making it easy to know when it's time for a change.

settings.heading: What sizes do Terra nappies come in?
settings.content: Terra nappies are available in a full range of sizes, from newborn to toddler.

settings.heading: How do I choose the right size nappy for my baby?
settings.content: Check your baby's weight and use the size chart on the packaging. If you notice leaks or red marks around the legs or waist, consider sizing up.

settings.heading: How often should I change my baby's nappy?
settings.content: At the Newborn stage, babies typically need 5-6 nappy changes a day. Always change a soiled nappy promptly to maintain skin health and comfort.

settings.subheading_faq: Explore answers to the most common questions about Terra Nappies, crafted to give you clarity and confidence.
